io.getstream.client.service

Class AbstractActivityService<T extends BaseActivity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.getstream.client.service.AbstractActivityService<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregatedActivityServiceImpl, FlatActivityServiceImpl, NotificationActivityServiceImpl, UserActivityServiceImpl

    public abstract class AbstractActivityService<T extends BaseActivity>
extends Object
    Provides operations to be performed against activities.

    • Method Detail

      • addActivity

        public T addActivity(T activity)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          StreamClientException
        Add a new activity of type T.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to add.
        Returns:
        Response activity of type T coming from the server.
        The returning activity in the 'to' field contains the targetFeedId along with its signature (e.g: 'user:1 6mQhuzQ79e0rZ17bSq1CCxXoRac')
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • addActivities

        public StreamActivitiesResponse<T> addActivities(List<T> activities)
                                                               throws IOException,
                                                                      StreamClientException
        Add a new activity of type T.
        Parameters:
        activities - List of Activities to add.
        Returns:
        Response activity of type T coming from the server.
        The returning activity in the 'to' field contains the targetFeedId along with its signature (e.g: 'user:1 6mQhuzQ79e0rZ17bSq1CCxXoRac')
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • updateActivities

        public StreamActivitiesResponse<T> updateActivities(List<T> activities)
                                                                  throws IOException,
                                                                         StreamClientException
        Add a new activity of type T.
        Parameters:
        activities - List of activities to update
        Returns:
        Response activity of type T coming from the server.
        The returning activity in the 'to' field contains the targetFeedId along with its signature (e.g: 'user:1 6mQhuzQ79e0rZ17bSq1CCxXoRac')
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • addActivityToMany

        public T addActivityToMany(List<String> targetIds,
                  T activity)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                StreamClientException
        Add a new activity of type T to multiple feeds.
        Parameters:
        targetIds - Destination feeds. A target id is defined as $feedSlug:$feedId.
        activity - Activity to add.
        Returns:
        Response activity of type T coming from the server.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
